Judul: PROPOSED MARKETING STRATEGY FOR DANA CITA
Abstrak:
Dana Cita is a start-up financial technology company which specializes in providing loan for educational purposes. Centralized in single office at Jakarta, Dana Cita aims to increase Indonesia’s human capital by making education affordable through student loan. As a start-up company, Dana Cita needs to adapt and improve each and every day to survive in the market. Currently, the company is facing many emerging business issues, both internally and externally. 

The research is made to discover an efficient marketing strategy for Dana Cita in order to increase the number of website visit, in which potentially converted into loan origination. Both internal and external analysis are done within the research to came up with holistic explanation and business solution. Upon discovering external and internal data, this research also uses survey in term of questionnaire distribution to discover customer’s perception on current marketing strategy.

The result of this paper is that current marketing strategy has significant impact on customer’s intention in website visiting, although it is not engaging enough to gain more website visit. There are 3 major solutions proposed in this research: Focused partnership roadmap, Sharia product development, and New video advertising as online marketing.
Kata Kunci: marketing strategy, business strategy, fintech, website visit
